service-001.title: Smart Website & Sales Funnel
service-001.description: We don't just build websites; we create automated systems that find customers 24/7, collect their information, and ensure sales.
benefits: Convert every visitor into a customer

service-002.title: Complete Facebook Page Management
service-002.description: From page setup to content creation, regular posting, ad management, and message automation - we handle all Facebook responsibilities.

service-003.title: 24/7 AI Sales Agent
service-003.description: No customer has to wait anymore, even on holidays or late at night. Our AI agent converts every opportunity into a sale with instant responses.
features: Lead handover & reporting for sales team

service-004.title: Digital Marketing & Advertising
service-004.description: No more marketing based on guesswork. We analyze data to create ads and SEO strategies that ensure maximum profit on every dollar.

service-005.title: Mobile App Development
service-005.description: Custom mobile apps for your business. Reach your customers on Android and iOS platforms. Built with modern technology and beautiful design.

faq-001.question: What exactly do you do? Are you just a marketing agency?
faq-001.answer: We're not just a marketing agency. We're a complete digital solutions provider. We offer website development, social media management, AI chatbots, and automation solutions that improve every digital touchpoint of your business.

faq-002.question: How long does it take to start a service?
faq-002.answer: Usually we start work within 7-10 days of signing the contract. However, this time may vary depending on project complexity. We always try to start quickly and effectively.

faq-003.question: What is the cost of your services?
faq-003.answer: Our pricing is ROI-based. Every business has different needs, so we create customized packages. Contact us for a free strategy session to learn the right solution for your business.

faq-004.question: How does the AI agent work?
faq-004.answer: Our AI agent talks to your customers 24/7, answers their questions, collects leads, and hands over to human sales team when needed. It can work on Facebook Messenger, website chat, and WhatsApp.

faq-005.question: What is the best way to contact you?
faq-005.answer: You can contact us via phone (01639590392), email (rahmatullahzisan@gmail.com), or Facebook Messenger. Fill out the form below for a free strategy session.

faq-1.question: How long does it take to get your service?
faq-1.answer: We usually start work within 24-48 hours. For urgent needs, we can start the same day.

faq-2.question: What are the payment methods?
faq-2.answer: We support bKash, Nagad, Rocket, and bank transfer. 50% advance payment and the rest upon completion.

faq-3.question: What is included in social media marketing?
faq-3.answer: Facebook, Instagram page management, content creation, boosting, ad campaigns, and monthly reports are included.

faq-4.question: What is the refund policy?
faq-4.answer: 100% refund before work starts. After work starts, refund is not applicable for completed work.

faq-5.question: How do I contact you?
faq-5.answer: You can contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, or email. We provide 24/7 support.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.description: At Digital Care Solutions, we give the highest priority to your data privacy.

section1.title: 1. What Information Do We Collect?
section1.content: We collect personal information you provide (name, email, phone number, company name, etc.) when you fill out forms on our website, join our affiliate program, or contact us directly. Additionally, analytics tools may collect browser, device, and usage behavior data.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Information Use
section2.content: Collected information is primarily used to provide services, customer support, notify about offers or updates, and improve our service quality. We never sell or illegally use your information to third parties.

section3.title: 3. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
section3.content: We use cookies in a limited scope to improve user experience and analyze website functionality. You can disable cookies from browser settings, but some website features may not work properly.

section4.title: 4. Information Security
section4.content: We use modern security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure. However, 100% security cannot be guaranteed for internet data transmission.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.content: We may use third-party services like payment gateways, analytics, or automation tools. These service providers have their own privacy policies. We cannot control their activities but try to ensure data protection under contract.

section6.title: 6. User Rights
section6.content: You can request to view, correct, or delete your personal information that we have. If you don't want to receive marketing messages, you can unsubscribe at any time.

section7.title: 7. Policy Changes
section7.content: This privacy policy may change from time to time due to technology or legal reasons. We will notify significant changes through website notice or email.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy, contact: rahmatullahzisan@gmail.com or 01639590392.
